thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 6 of 45
thread.title: Albert

author: Albert
title: Albert
text:
We received our repaired super automatic expresso machine from WholeLatteLove in perfect working order. After a month in service it is still working perfectly.
Only one issue that bothers me is that we specifically requested that screws with rusty heads be replaced. We were assured this would happen when we upgraded the repair to include the additional cleaning and cosmetic service.
Albert
